definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)

sentences.english: and burned fragrant incense on it, as the Lord commanded him.
sentences.chinese: 在坛上烧了麝香料做的香，是照耶和华所吩咐他的。

sentences.english: And he built an altar there to the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 也在那里审判以色列人，且为耶和华筑了一座坛。

sentences.english: He shall also burn the fat of the sin offering on the altar.
sentences.chinese: 赎罪祭牲的脂油要在坛上焚烧。

sentences.english: This sphere is the main essence of the mandala principle.
sentences.chinese: 这种境界即是坛城原理的精要。

sentences.english: Thangkas are usually rectangular in shape, and the square ones are reserved for mandalas.
sentences.chinese: 唐卡通常是长方形的，正方形的被留到坛城使用。

sentences.english: and offer it on the altar, together with the grain offering, and make atonement for him, and he will be clean.
sentences.chinese: 把燔祭和素祭献在坛上为他赎罪，他就洁净了。

sentences.english: He burned the bones of the priests on their altars, and so he purged Judah and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 将他们祭司的骸骨烧在坛上，洁净了犹大和耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: The poles are to be inserted into the rings so they will be on two sides of the altar when it is carried.
sentences.chinese: 这贡要穿在坛两旁的环子内，用以抬坛。

sentences.english: Then the altar will be most holy, and whatever touches it will be holy.
The priest shall take the basket from your hands and set it down in front of the altar of the LORD your God.
sentences.chinese: 祭司就从你手里取过筐子来，放在耶和华你神的坛前。

sentences.english: He thought of his paper as a pulpit.
sentences.chinese: 他当初把这份报纸当做一个讲道坛。

sentences.english: Then at the place where I saw the angel of the Lord, I built a altar.
sentences.chinese: 随后，在那个主的使者出现的地方，我立了一座坛。

sentences.english: He shall remove all the fat from it and burn it on the altar
sentences.chinese: 把牛所有的脂油都取下，烧在坛上。

sentences.english: There are different types of Mandalas - which vary from cukture to culture.
sentences.chinese: “四个坛城”指的是不同类型的坛城。

sentences.english: There are different types of Mandalas - which vary from cukture to culture.
sentences.chinese: “四个坛城”指的是不同类型的坛城。

sentences.english: Sounde weird to me what on earth is this wine?
sentences.chinese: 我好奇怪，点解会有坛咁嘅酒。

definition: pottery container for water, wine etc
to seal jars etc with mud, clay or lute/lute/luting
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel
to offer a sacrifice to (gods or ancestors)/memorial ceremony/(in classical novels) to recite an incantation to activate a magic weapon/(lit. and fig.) to wield
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
to consecrate/to enshrine and worship/an offering (to one's ancestors)/a sacrifice (to a God)
a squat jar for holding wine, sauces etc
